program main

   implicit none

   ! Variables for first part

   integer :: n, i, left, right, first_result, a(100000), b(100000)

   ! Variables for second part

   integer :: x, prime_result, sqrt_x, i_div, found

   ! Variables for third part

   character(len=20) :: s

   integer, parameter :: MOD = 1000000007

   integer :: m, digit, current_char, base, dp(0:100000,0:12), pre, new_rem

   ! Read first part's input

   read*, n

   allocate(a(n), b(n))

   do i=1,n

      read*, a(i), b(i)

   end do

   ! Compute first part's result

   left = huge(left)  ! Initialize to max int

   right = -huge(right)

   do i=1,n

      if (a(i) < left) then

         left = a(i)

      end if

      if (b(i) > right) then

         right = b(i)

      end if

   end do

   first_result = -1

   do i=1,n

      if (a(i) == left .and. b(i) == right) then

         first_result = i

         exit

      end if

   end do

   ! Now process second part

   x = first_result

   if (x /=2 .and. mod(x,2) ==0) then

      x = x +1

   end if

   prime_result = x

   do while (true)

      sqrt_x = nint(sqrt(real(prime_result)))

      found = .false.

      do i_div=3, sqrt_x, 2

         if (mod(prime_result, i_div) ==0) then

            found = .true.

            exit

         end if

      end do

      if (.not. found) then

         exit

      else

         prime_result = prime_result +2

      end if

   end do

   ! Now process third part

   write(s, '(i0)') prime_result

   m = len_trim(s)

   ! Initialize DP array

   dp = 0

   dp(0,0) =1

   base =1

   do i=1, m

      current_char = ichar(s(m -i +1))

      if (current_char == ichar('?')) then

         ! '?' case: loop over digits 0-9

         do digit=0,9

            do pre=0,12

               new_rem = mod(base * digit + pre,13)

               dp(i, new_rem) = dp(i, new_rem) + dp(i-1, pre)

               if (dp(i, new_rem) >= MOD) dp(i, new_rem) = dp(i, new_rem) - MOD

            end do

         end do

      else

         digit = current_char - ichar('0')

         do pre=0,12

            new_rem = mod(base * digit + pre,13)

            dp(i, new_rem) = dp(i, new_rem) + dp(i-1, pre)

            if (dp(i, new_rem) >= MOD) dp(i, new_rem) = dp(i, new_rem) - MOD

         end do

      end if

      ! Update base

      base = mod(base *10,13)

   end do

   ! The result is dp(m,5) mod MOD

   print*, mod(dp(m,5), MOD)

end program main

program main
   implicit none

   ! First part variables
   integer :: n, i, left, right, first_result
   integer, allocatable :: a(:), b(:)

   ! Second part variables
   integer :: x, prime_result, sqrt_x, i_div, found

   ! Third part variables
   character(len=20) :: s
   integer, parameter :: MOD = 1000000007
   integer :: m, digit, current_char, base
   integer, allocatable :: dp(:,:)

   ! Read first part's input
   read*, n
   allocate(a(n), b(n))
   do i = 1, n
      read*, a(i), b(i)
   end do

   ! Compute first part's result
   left = huge(left)
   right = -huge(right)
   do i = 1, n
      if (a(i) < left) then
         left = a(i)
      end if
      if (b(i) > right) then
         right = b(i)
      end if
   end do

   first_result = -1
   do i = 1, n
      if (a(i) == left .and. b(i) == right) then
         first_result = i
         exit
      end if
   end do

   ! Process second part
   x = first_result
   if (x /= 2 .and. mod(x, 2) == 0) then
      x = x + 1
   end if
   prime_result = x

   do while (true)
      sqrt_x = nint(sqrt(real(prime_result)))
      found = .false.
      do i_div = 3, sqrt_x, 2
         if (mod(prime_result, i_div) == 0) then
            found = .true.
            exit
         end if
      end do
      if (.not. found) then
         exit
      else
         prime_result = prime_result + 2
      end if
   end do

   ! Process third part
   write(s, '(i0)') prime_result
   m = len_trim(s)
   allocate(dp(0:m, 0:12))
   dp = 0
   dp(0, 0) = 1
   base = 1

   do i = 1, m
      current_char = ichar(s(m - i + 1))
      if (current_char == ichar('?')) then
         ! '?' case: loop over digits 0-9
         do pre = 0, 12
            do digit = 0, 9
               new_rem = mod(base * digit + pre, 13)
               dp(i, new_rem) = mod(dp(i, new_rem) + dp(i-1, pre), MOD)
            end do
         end do
      else
         digit = current_char - ichar('0')
         do pre = 0, 12
            new_rem = mod(base * digit + pre, 13)
            dp(i, new_rem) = mod(dp(i, new_rem) + dp(i-1, pre), MOD)
         end do
      end if

      ! Update base
      base = mod(base * 10, 13)
   end do

   print*, mod(dp(m, 5), MOD)
   deallocate(a, b, dp)
end program main
